p: A. trifoliatus leaf samples were collected in Thailand. They were authenticated at Queen Sirikit Botanic Garden, Thailand. Voucher specimens were deposited at School of Integrative Medicine, Mae Fah Luang University, Thailand. Leaf samples were washed and then dried at 50°C. The dried leaf samples were stored at room temperature. For antioxidant and anticancer activities, the dried leaf samples were pulverized and exhaustively extracted using Soxhlet apparatus. The extract was filtered, evaporated, and then stored at −20°C. All chemicals were analytical grade.
